title: Which movies got ruined by the acting? - Quora

response.answer_text: Although it still would have been terrible, my example is Home Alone (5): The Holiday Heist…  Now the movie is not good, but Ellie Harvie’s performance as Catherine Baxter made me hang myself (figuratively.)  Her performance is very flat and cringeworthy. And although too many plots overcrowd this movie (a robber hates Ronald Reagan; a teenage girl wants a new tablet etc,) this actress makes this movie almost as bad as Home Alone 4: Taking Back the House.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Agrisan Dragos Mihai

response.answer_text: Top 10 movies ruined by acting: 10. Live By Night 9. Mile 22 8. In The Cut 7. Gotti 6. Hell Fest 5. Misconduct 4. Jack And Jill 3. Suicide Squad 2. Alex Cross The Room
